title: Chelsea transfer target Tiemoue Bakayoko dreams of PSG move
text:
Tiemoue Bakayoko would love to play for PSG (Picture: Getty) Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko dreams of a move to Paris Saint-Germain despite growing speculation that his transfer to Chelsea is close to being complete.
Five players in the Mourinho mould who could fit his plans to restore Man Utd to greatness That’s according to his brother and agent, who has spoken about his client’s future after his superb form in Ligue 1 and the Champions League this season.
Bakayoko has emerged as one of the rising stars of European football, and recent reports suggested Chelsea were closing in on signing him in a £35million deal.
Bakayoko has been linked with Chelsea and other top clubs lately (Picture: Getty) Still, if PSG show an interest they could lead the queue for his signature, as the 22-year-old would love to live in Paris.
‘We’ve talked about it because Tiemoue is Parisian,’ his agent told RMC.

‘When he was young, he wanted to go to PSG. He’s always dreamed of moving there.’
Last month, the player himself spoke of his trial with the club as a youngster, and admitted: ‘If the opportunity presents itself, I will not refuse a move to PSG.
‘But I am only 22 and I feel very good at Monaco.’
